item.title: 当企业想要转型为银行时，他们会联系这些公司
item.description:
在特朗普执政期间，金融公司正争相获取美国银行牌照，其中至少有十余家获得了克拉罗斯集团的咨询服务。

【原文：

Financial firms are racing to secure US bank charters during Trump’s presidency, with Klaros Group advising at least a dozen of them.

】

item.title: 智利投资者转向海外市场，美联储政策与地缘政治因素推升利率
item.description: 智利固定收益投资者今年正将目光投向国内局势之外，华盛顿的决策和地缘政治热点事件正盖过新政府上台带来的影响。【原文：Chilean fixed-income investors are looking beyond domestic developments this year, with decisions in Washington and geopolitical flashpoints eclipsing the impact of a new administration at home.】

item.title: 穆迪称，到2030年数据中心将需要3万亿美元投资
item.description: 穆迪评级公司表示，未来五年内，至少3万亿美元将流入数据中心相关投资领域，这些资金将依赖信贷市场的多个领域提供支持。【原文：At least $3 trillion is set to flow into data-center-related investments over the next five years, capital that will rely on the might of multiple areas of the credit markets to provide, according to Moody’s Ratings.】

item.title: 花旗分析师曼西认为更多投资者正将资金分散投资于美国股市之外
item.description: 花旗集团策略师表示，投资者将在2026年继续推进其分散股票持仓的计划，推动全球基准股指再涨10%。【原文：Investors will push ahead with their desire to diversify equity holdings in 2026, driving a further 10% gain for a benchmark global stock index, according to Citigroup Inc. strategists.】

item.title: 印度通胀率维持低位，为降息留有空间
item.description: 印度12月通胀率加速上升，但仍低于印度储备银行设定的2%-6%目标区间，这为央行在2月会议上降息留下了充足空间。【原文：India’s inflation accelerated in December while remaining below the Reserve Bank of India’s target range of 2%-6%, leaving ample room for the central bank to cut interest rates at its February meet.】

item.title: 塔塔咨询服务公司利润低于预期，科技支出尚未回升
item.description: 塔塔咨询服务公司季度盈利未达分析师预期，因地缘政治紧张局势持续发酵，企业继续限制信息技术项目的支出。【原文：Tata Consultancy Services Ltd.’s quarterly earnings missed analysts’ estimates, as corporations continue to limit spending on information technology projects in an era of geopolitical tensions.】

item.title: 为特朗普起诉媒体的律师办公桌后方摆放着"特朗普终结者"玩偶
item.description: 在迈阿密附近一间角落办公室里，亚历杭德罗·"亚历克斯"·布里托最著名的客户仅以一尊摇头娃娃的形式存在——那尊摆在办公桌后架子上的玩偶，将唐纳德·特朗普总统塑造成科幻系列电影《终结者》的形象，身着皮夹克，戴着墨镜。【原文：The only sign of Alejandro “Alex” Brito’s most famous client in his corner office near Miami is a bobblehead doll depicting President Donald Trump as the “Terminator” from the sci-fi franchise, sporting a leather jacket and sunglasses, on a shelf behind his desk.】

item.title: 美国大型银行财报将揭示经济前景，预计将呈现繁荣态势
item.description: 美国银行股的反弹行情将迎来今年首次考验，华尔街龙头企业即将公布财报，投资者将重点关注高管对美国消费者健康状况及全球最大经济体强度的评论。【原文：The rally in US bank stocks will face its first test of the year as Wall Street’s marquee names report results, with investors keying on executive commentary about the health of the American consumer and the strength of the world’s largest economy.】

item.title: 欧洲央行穆勒承诺当选副行长后将奉行保守利率政策
item.description: 欧洲央行管理委员会成员马迪斯·穆勒承诺，若下周当选该机构副行长，将坚持其当前的利率政策立场。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Madis Muller pledged to stick to his current stance on rate setting if he were chosen as the institution’s vice president next week.】

item.title: Apheon最新旗舰基金募资额达12.5亿欧元，触及硬性上限
item.description: 阿菲昂管理公司第六期旗舰基金已达到12.5亿欧元（15亿美元）的硬性上限。【原文：Apheon Management SA has hit a €1.25 billion ($1.5 billion) hard cap for its sixth flagship fund.】

item.title: NBA欧洲赛区以每支球队10亿美元的估值向投资者推介
item.description: 美国国家篮球协会正筹备向投资者推介一项欧洲新联赛，目标球队估值高达10亿美元，同时该联盟也将在伦敦和柏林举办两场常规赛。【原文：The National Basketball Association is preparing to pitch investors on a new European league, targeting team valuations of up to $1 billion, as it readies a pair of regular season games in London and Berlin.】

item.title: 雅各布斯公司QXO基金融资规模增至30亿美元以推进并购计划
item.description: 知情人士透露，QXO公司正从淡马锡控股等投资者处筹集18亿美元资金以支持其收购战略，这笔融资额远超该公司上周宣布与阿波罗全球管理公司达成的12亿美元融资协议。【原文：QXO Inc. is raising another $1.8 billion from investors including Temasek Holdings Pte. to support its acquisition strategy, according to people familiar with the matter, well more than doubling the $1.2 billion financing deal it announced last week with Apollo Global Management Inc.】

item.title: 新加坡交易所拟推出印度及东南亚债券期货
item.description: 据知情人士透露，新加坡交易所已与多家全球银行的财务官员进行多次通话，商讨推出与部分亚洲政府债券市场挂钩的期货合约事宜。【原文：Singapore Exchange held multiple calls with treasury officials from global banks about introducing futures tied to some Asian government bond markets, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: BE半导体股价飙升，第四季度订单量翻倍
item.description: 荷兰芯片设备制造商BE Semiconductor Industries NV表示，受数据中心应用需求增长及光子学客户订单推动，其第四季度订单量实现翻倍，该公司股价应声上涨。【原文：BE Semiconductor Industries NV’s shares rose after the Dutch chip toolmaker said fourth quarter orders doubled on the back of increased demand for data center applications and from photonics customers.】

item.title: 达索以14亿美元估值投资法国无人机制造商
item.description: 达索航空公司作为阵风战斗机的开发商，牵头对鲜为人知的无人机公司Harmattan AI进行了2亿美元的投资，使其成为欧洲最新晋升的独角兽初创企业之一。【原文：Dassault Aviation SA, developer of the Rafale fighter jet, led a $200 million investment into the relatively unknown drone company Harmattan AI, making it one of Europe’s newest unicorn startups.】

item.title: 南非审议基准利率，该利率曾用于定价3780亿美元信贷
item.description: 南非正在重新审视商业银行为客户定价数万亿兰特贷款所采用的主要基准利率。【原文：South Africa is reviewing the main reference rate commercial banks use to price trillions of rands of loans to clients.】

item.title: 瑞银再度否决瑞士资本计划，反对声浪高涨
item.description: 瑞银集团表示，计划中的瑞士银行业改革对国民经济构成威胁，同时政府正面临日益增大的压力，要求其淡化改革提案。【原文：UBS Group AG said planned Swiss banking reforms are a threat to the national economy as pressure builds on the government to water down its proposals.】

60/40策略的过去与未来。

The past and future of the 60/40 strategy.

item.title: 万科美元债券持有人被咨询公司要求宣告违约
item.description: 知情人士称，一家债务咨询公司建议中国万科公司的美元债券持有人考虑根据交叉违约条款，对这家陷入困境的开发商的债券宣告违约。【原文：A debt advisory firm asked China Vanke Co. dollar bondholders to consider calling a default on the embattled developer’s notes, based on cross-default clauses, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 零散股：柯伦·罗什谈构建完美投资组合（播客）
item.description: 长期以来，一个简单的60/40投资组合就能让你赚得盆满钵满，夜里睡得安稳。你把60%的资金投入股票，40%配置国债。股票通常会上涨。 国债在市场波动时提供缓冲并创造收益。然而当40年来最严重的通胀来袭时，这类组合中的国债部分遭受重创。那么这种策略是否依然有效？若已失效，投资者该如何重新规划个人资产配置？【原文：For a long time, you could make plenty of money and sleep easy at night with a simple 60/40 portfolio. You put 60% of your money in stocks and 40% in Treasuries. The stocks generally went up. The Treasuries cushioned you during times of volatility and provided income. Then we got the worst inflation in 40 years, and the Treasury part of those portfolios got obliterated. So does it still work? And if not, how should an investor think about their own personal allocations to various asset classes.】

item.title: BBVA正寻求出售约3.8亿欧元的不良抵押贷款
item.description: BBVA SA正寻求出售约3.8亿欧元（4.44亿美元）的不良抵押贷款，以清理其资产负债表。【原文：BBVA SA is seeking to sell about €380 million ($444 million) in soured mortgages as it cleans up its balance sheet.】

item.title: DeepSeek创始人梁氏基金规模激增57%，中国量化投资热潮兴起
item.description: DeepSeek创始人梁文峰的量化对冲基金去年收益率超过50%，为这家企业注入了更多潜在资金。尽管投入远低于竞争对手，该公司已成功撼动全球科技格局。【原文：DeepSeek founder Liang Wenfeng’s quantitative hedge fund generated returns of more than 50% last year, boosting the potential war chest for a company that has already shaken up the global tech landscape despite spending far less than rivals.】

item.title: 欧洲股市下跌，因市场担忧美联储独立性加剧
item.description: 欧洲股市从历史高位回落，因对美联储独立性的担忧削弱了投资者信心。【原文：European stocks retreated from record highs as concerns over the independence of the Federal Reserve sapped investor confidence.】

item.title: 美国特使称与印度的贸易协议分歧将得到解决
item.description: 美国和印度是亲密伙伴，双方将解决分歧，包括长期拖延的贸易协议问题。美国总统特朗普政府新任命的驻印度大使塞尔吉奥·戈尔如是说。【原文：US and India are close partners and will resolve their differences, including over a long delayed trade deal, said Sergio Gor, the new US Ambassador to India appointed by President Donald Trump’s administration.】

item.title: 中国境内股市成交额飙升至创纪录的5160亿美元
item.description: 周一，上海和深圳股市成交额达到3.6万亿元人民币（合5160亿美元）的历史新高，中国股市的动物精神持续高涨。【原文：Stock turnover in Shanghai and Shenzhen reached an all-time high on Monday of 3.6 trillion yuan ($516 billion) as animal spirits continue to mount in Chinese equities.】

item.title: Palantir联合创始人隆斯代尔将投资尼日利亚无人机制造商
item.description: 帕兰提尔科技公司联合创始人乔·朗斯代尔带领投资者押注一家鲜为人知的尼日利亚国防初创企业。随着暴力极端主义在非洲蔓延，该公司正扩大无人机制造规模。【原文：Palantir Technologies Inc. co-founder Joe Lonsdale led investors betting on a little-known Nigerian defense startup that’s expanding drone manufacturing as violent extremism spreads across Africa.】

item.title: 喜力首席执行官辞职，啤酒销量下滑重创啤酒商
item.description: 喜力啤酒公司首席执行官多尔夫·范登布林克宣布辞职，此前数月该公司因啤酒销量下滑发布盈利预警。【原文：Heineken NV Chief Executive Officer Dolf van den Brink is stepping down months after the brewer issued a profit warning amid a slump in beer sales.】

item.title: 英镑小幅走高，美联储威胁打压美元
美联储传票重启"卖给美国"交易，因对自主权的担忧
item.description: 周一，特朗普政府加剧对美联储的攻击，引发市场对央行独立性的担忧，"抛售美国资产"情绪席卷全球市场。【原文：‘Sell America’ sentiment swept through markets on Monday after the Trump administration escalated its attacks on the Federal Reserve, fueling concerns over central bank autonomy.】

item.title: 印度航天局火箭一年内第二次发射失败
item.description: 印度航天局在2026年伊始遭遇挫折，其火箭第二次未能进入预定轨道，凸显了该国航天雄心的挑战。【原文：India’s space agency began 2026 with a setback after its rocket failed for the second time to achieve the desired orbit, underscoring challenges to the country’s ambitions.】
